lead_paragraph: Turkey’s prime minister ordered the investigation after images appearing to show the man’s body being dragged through the streets were widely shared on social networks.

headline.main: Turkey to Investigate Images of Dead Kurdish Man Being Dragged
headline.print_headline: Turkey to Investigate Images of Dead Kurdish Man Being Dragged

snippet: Turkey’s prime minister ordered the investigation after images appearing to show the man’s body being dragged through the streets were widely shared on social networks.
